title: Jesse Burgheimer
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809022839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809022839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Jesse Burgheimer**

Type designer, graphic designer, based in [San Francisco](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809022839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/San%20Francisco), [California](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809022839/http:/typophile.com/wiki/California).
